resources.string: Please review the need for antibiotics for your patient
Based on the results from 3 validated models, antibiotics is not recommended for your patient

Get recommendations on whether antibiotics is required for your uncomplicated URTI patient, based on results from 3 validated models developed from local epidemiological and clinical data obtained from an adult ED in Singapore. \n \nRemember to open up the app when thereâ€™s internet connection for data synchronization purpose
